New Records: Rahmanullah Gurbaz scored 84 off 45 balls in the match
Sri Lanka completed the highest ever chase against Afghanistan in T20Is
Key Match Events: Rahmanullah Gurbaz's 84 was the highest score for Afghanistan
Danushka Gunathilaka and Bhanuka Rajapaksa's crucial contributions sealed the win for Sri Lanka
Rashid Khan's performance was noted as expensive
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka elected to field first after winning the toss
Afghanistan's batters struggled to capitalize in the death overs
Sri Lanka's bowlers maintained momentum from the start
Post-Match Reflections: Afghanistan captain Mohammed Nabi admitted to missed opportunities and drops
Sri Lanka captain Dasun Shanaka highlighted the importance of partnerships and execution of plans
Rahmanullah Gurbaz expressed hope to build on this form for the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of the Men's T20 Asia Cup 2022
Sri Lanka's young fast bowlers performed well in death overs
The game was a pivotal moment in the tournament for both teams
